CustomField.description: Used to segregate assessment requirements, requirement sources and assessment records to a defined scope (individual office, region, division, division subgroup, etc.). For example, the first assessment will be for Hospitality S&C/SO. Later assessments may be done for Hospitality PMS and Hospitality TravelClick.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Scope of the assessment this requirement source is related to
CustomField.label: Assessment Scope
